# Max Value

> Maximum [double-precision floating-point number][ieee754].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var FLOAT64_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-max' );
```

#### FLOAT64_MAX

Maximum [double-precision floating-point number][ieee754].

```javascript
var bool = ( FLOAT64_MAX === 1.7976931348623157e+308 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
